page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: My hobby is model making. I do it in the winter when it is too cold to play outside and there is nothing to do. I go and get my glue and my paints and the model kit. I have got a new model, it is a racing car. It is quite small but it is hard to make because you have to put the engine together. My Dad put "Goodyear" on the tyres when it was finished. We are going to make a cabinet to put the models in. Next I am making a hovercraft, there are lots of parts in the set like little cars that go inside and the propellers. The model kits are made from plastic and you fit them together with special glue and you paint them with Airfix paints. You can get model aeroplane kits out of cornflake packets but they are tiny and hard to make. I don't like painting them.
